132.movie_name: And Now for Something Completely Different (1971)

116.movie_plot: A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs and rock n' roll.

64.movie_plot: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

94.movie_plot: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

58.movie_plot: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.
